selection of photographs, audio files and video snippets to use in your
finished film.

### 5\. Midjourney: Artificial intelligence tool for art images

One of our favorite applications is this one. Similar to Dall-E 2, Midjourney
is a text-based prompt-based image-generation program that makes realistic
images.

It mostly focuses on producing photographs in a certain aesthetic with a
fantasy fiction subject. It truly does amazing things.

When we were young, we constantly imagined the characters from movies or video
games, giving them unique abilities and looks.

This vision is transformed into digital art by Midjourney. It is a free plan
really helpful tool, particularly for those who enjoy writing and producing
fantasy-related content.

Maybe you even want to use the tool to make family photos or other fun things.

### 6\. Dall-E 2: AI tool for image generation

A free, open-source picture generator that makes use of artificial
intelligence is called Dall-E 2.

You just put your request into the box provided, and Dall-E 2 takes care of
the rest to produce a photo you may download.

Dall-E 2 still creates beautiful images even after you add specifications and
broaden your instructions as you choose.

You use prompts to get the outcome. You can always add comments to get better
responses.

### 7\. Point-E: Create 3D models

This instrument is also a product of OpenAI. Point-E uses prompts to assist
users in creating 3D models.

To provide results, it combines the “text to images” and “images to 3D model”
algorithms.

A 3D model with coordinates that you may rotate and reorient in the 3D
coordinate system is included in the final results.

There are no registration or login requirements to utilize Point-E.

## Other tools

There are many other purposes you can use artificial intelligence for.
Examples are coding for developers.

Developers can use scikit learn in coding, for machine learning in python.
Using scikit learn makes coding for developers easier and faster.

An artificial intelligence technique called a neural networks instructs
computers to analyze data in a manner modeled after the human brain.

Deep learning is a sort of machine learning that employs linked neurons
(neural networks) or nodes in a layered framework to mimic the human brain and
native integrations.

Other areas it can be beneficial to use it, are areas like insurance and
insurance analytics, research tool for research purposes, human resource and
for the health sector.

top.

The tool you should pick depends on your specific needs. Most of them has a
free trial, so you can try multiple ones and choose the best ai tool after.

## Part 1: The Power of Retainer Offers for AI Automation Agencies

Retainer offers are long-term contracts that clients sign with your agency,
typically on a monthly basis.

These contracts ensure ongoing services and revenue, creating a predictable
income stream.

While retainer offers might not be necessary when you’re just starting, they
become invaluable as your agency grows and matures.

Here’s why:

### 1\. Predictable Revenue:

One of the most significant advantages of retainer offers is the predictable
income they provide.

Instead of constantly chasing new clients, you have a solid base of existing
clients who are committed to your services.

👉 How to Build AI Chatbots

### 2\. Client Retention:

Retainer offers encourage client loyalty.

When clients sign a retainer contract, they are more likely to stay with your
agency for an extended period, reducing churn rates.

### 3\. Deeper Client Relationships:

Retainer clients often require ongoing support and updates.

This allows you to build deeper relationships, understand their needs better,
and provide tailored solutions.

### 4\. Time Efficiency:

Retainers minimize the time spent on sales and marketing, allowing you to
focus on delivering high-quality services and expanding your agency.

## Part 2: Structuring Effective Retainer Offers

Now that we understand the importance of retainer offers, let’s dive into how
to structure them effectively for your AI automation agency.

### 1\. Basic Maintenance Package:

  * This package provides peace of mind to clients.
  * Automations are set up on their accounts, with clients covering platform costs.
  * Charge a fixed monthly fee for bug fixes and support.

### 2\. Maintenance Plus Improvement Package:

  * Similar to the basic maintenance package but includes additional features.
  * Offer new features to clients when they become available, enhancing the value of the retainer.
  * Set limits on the number of improvements to manage client expectations.

### 3\. Automation as a Service (AaaS):

  * In this model, you manage all automations on your accounts and cover the associated costs.
  * Clients rely solely on your services to benefit from the automations.
  * Offer monthly flat fees, monthly flat fees plus usage charges, or purely usage-based billing.

### 4\. Productized AI Automation Package (Advanced):

  * This is the pinnacle of retainer offers for AI automation agencies.
  * Clients pay a premium fee for a full automation partnership.
  * No need for scoping or contracting; clients have ongoing access to your automation services.

### Pricing Strategies:

  * Estimate the number of hours your developers will spend each month.
  * Mark up the estimate by at least 2-3 times, ensuring a healthy margin.
  * For usage-based billing, mark up the platform costs based on client usage.
  * Charge separately for major improvements and new features.

## Part 3: Avoiding Common Retainer Mistakes

As you explore retainer offers for your AI automation agency, beware of these
common mistakes:

### 1\. Accepting the Wrong Clients:

Not all clients are a good fit for retainers. Be selective and work with
clients who align with your agency’s values and goals to avoid problematic
relationships.

### 2\. Charging Too Little:

Underpricing your retainers can lead to unsustainable business models and
undervalue your services. Ensure your pricing reflects the value you provide.

### 3\. Getting Locked into Long Contracts:

Avoid lengthy contracts, especially if you’re unsure about the client.
Retainer offers should offer flexibility, allowing you to exit if needed.

### 4\. Pursuing Retainers Too Early:

Focus on building case studies and gaining experience before diving into
retainer offers. Clients will pay more for your services when they see your
results.

## Part 4: The Future of AI Automation Agency Retainers (Advanced)

At Insidr.ai, we’ve developed an advanced pure retainer model that takes the
concept of retainer offers to new heights. This model involves:

### 1\. Subscription Purchase:

Clients buy a subscription directly from our website, with options for
monthly, quarterly, or yearly terms.

### 2\. Workshop Call:

After subscribing, clients have a workshop call with our team to understand
their business inside out and identify automation opportunities.

### 3\. Task Management:

We create a Trello board with actionable tasks based on the workshop call.
Clients can review, prioritize, and move tasks to indicate what they want us
to work on.

### 4\. Service Delivery:

All communication occurs on Trello via comments, streamlining communication
and reducing back-and-forth emails. This method ensures more efficient work
delivery.

## Conclusion

Retainer offers can be a game-changer for AI automation agencies.

They provide predictable revenue, deeper client relationships, and time
efficiency.

However, it’s crucial to structure them effectively, avoid common mistakes,
and consider advanced models as your agency grows.

Whether you’re just starting or looking to take your agency to the next level,
retainer offers can be a powerful tool in your toolkit.

Remember, success in the world of AI automation agencies often comes to those
who are patient, focused on learning, and willing to adapt their business
models as they grow.

The future of AI automation agencies is bright, and retainer offers can be
your ticket to a sustainable and thriving business in this exciting industry.
